## Resources.ICandidateValueCollectorCreateParams.normalizer property

Optional normalizer to use for normalizing JSON values. If not provided, a default Crc32Normalizer will be used.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalizer?: Hash.HashingNormalizer;
```
